creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: flat planes of color; squat lantern in foreground with cutouts; orange leaves on trees; white wall topped with grey roof tiles in background; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Seal

in left  LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [Lantern and Mapl
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper with embossing
title: Lantern and Maples
